732169f-b.title: Islands - Shooters Island - [Newark Bay - Mariners Harbor, Staten Island.]
732169f-b.text:
Shooters Island, in Newark Bay, off the shore of Mariners
Harbor, Staten Island, seen from the latter. On the island can
be seen the skeletons of shipbuilding works.
April 15, 1924
P. L. Snerr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
Another view of the shipbnilding works on Shooters
Idlandw as seen from -ariners arbor, Staten Island. Also
shown As the shore of Bayonne, New Jersey.
April 15, 1924
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

732170f-a.title: Islands - Shooters Island - [Kill Van Kull.]
732170f-a.text:
Shooters Island, in the Kill Van Kull, showing shipbuilding
yards. View 1 and 2 are from the Staten Island shore and view
3 from the Bayonne Bridge.
P. L. Sperr  Views 1,2: February 15, 1932
NO REPRODUCTIONS  View 3: May 19, 1935
